subject: Dear: Mr. Jason,
body:
QUONTIC BANK
Headquarter: 1 Rockefeller Plaza 9th Floor, New York, NY 10020
E-mail: QunticBank@fastservice.com


Dear: Mr. Jason,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail, Note this payment was
approved after the meeting held by World Bank IMF UN and G20,  This payment
is for 18 listed beneficiaries that have lost their money to scammers, and
have not yet receive any refund payment from the government, after the
meeting held by all the stakeholders it agreed and signed that 18 listed
beneficiaries will be refunded and compensated with the sum of
$1,000,000.00 each and your name and contact email was included as one of
the beneficiaries.

Quontic Bank Of New York was appointed by all the stakeholders to handle
this transaction and to make sure that all listed beneficiaries receive
their complete compensation payment of $1,000,000.00 successfully.

It is my duty as the C.A.O of Quontic Bank to inform you that this
transaction is 100% real and 100% genuine and you will receive your
compensation payment $1,000,000.00 successfully without any delay if only
you will comply with our Banking procedure.

Meanwhile you are to reconfirm your information to avoid any mistake and to
enable us commence processing. Note this transaction will not take more
than 5 working days to receive your fund successfully depending on your
seriousness and level of communication with us.

1, Your full name
2, Your complete address
3, Your age and occupation
4, Your Direct phone number
5, Your International passport/Driving License
6, Your marital status.


Upon the receipt of the above information from you, we will direct you on
the next procedural step hence the above detailed information is absolutely
necessary for the processing of your transaction accordingly.

My I.D attached.

Thanks as we wait to hear from you.

Sincerely,

Mr.  Michael Tanzi
Quontic Bank  C.A.O

subject: Re: Dear: Mr. Jason,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the payment approval and the involvement of various organizations. Can you tell me more about how Quontic Bank is ensuring the safe and timely delivery of these refunds to individuals who have been affected by scams?

Best wishes,
Jason

subject: Re: Dear: Mr. Jason,
body:
QUONTIC BANK
Headquarter: 1 Rockefeller Plaza 9th Floor, New York, NY 10020
E-mail: QunticBank@fastservice.com


Dear: Mr. Jason,

Your message received and the content therein is well noted and understood.

Regarding your question, 3 beneficiaries have already received their funds,
Like I said in my previous message, this transaction will not take more
than 5 working days to receive your funds successfully depending on your
seriousness and level of communication with us.

Upon the receipt of the above information from you, we will direct you on
the next procedural step hence the above detailed information is absolutely
necessary for the processing of your transaction accordingly.

Thanks as we wait to hear from you.

Sincerely,

Mr.  Michael Tanzi
Quontic Bank  C.A.O

subject: Re: Dear: Mr. Jason,
body:
Hello! Thank you for your message. I appreciate the update on the funds transfer process. Could you please provide more details on the next steps I need to take to ensure a smooth transaction? Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jason

subject: Re: Dear: Mr. Jason,
body:

Best wishes,
Jason

subject: Re: Dear: Mr. Jason,
body:

Best wishes,

body:

Looking forward to your response.
